description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
name: Suspicious PowerShell Parameter Substring
query: (process.executable:(*\\Powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-windowstyle\ h\ * OR *\ \-windowstyl\ h* OR *\ \-windowsty\ h* OR *\ \-windowst\ h* OR *\ \-windows\ h* OR *\ \-windo\ h* OR *\ \-wind\ h* OR *\ \-win\ h* OR *\ \-wi\ h* OR *\ \-win\ h\ * OR *\ \-win\ hi\ * OR *\ \-win\ hid\ * OR *\ \-win\ hidd\ * OR *\ \-win\ hidde\ * OR *\ \-NoPr\ * OR *\ \-NoPro\ * OR *\ \-NoProf\ * OR *\ \-NoProfi\ * OR *\ \-NoProfil\ * OR *\ \-nonin\ * OR *\ \-nonint\ * OR *\ \-noninte\ * OR *\ \-noninter\ * OR *\ \-nonintera\ * OR *\ \-noninterac\ * OR *\ \-noninteract\ * OR *\ \-noninteracti\ * OR *\ \-noninteractiv\ * OR *\ \-ec\ * OR *\ \-encodedComman\ * OR *\ \-encodedComma\ * OR *\ \-encodedComm\ * OR *\ \-encodedCom\ * OR *\ \-encodedCo\ * OR *\ \-encodedC\ * OR *\ \-encoded\ * OR *\ \-encode\ * OR *\ \-encod\ * OR *\ \-enco\ * OR *\ \-en\ * OR *\ \-executionpolic\ * OR *\ \-executionpoli\ * OR *\ \-executionpol\ * OR *\ \-executionpo\ * OR *\ \-executionp\ * OR *\ \-execution\ bypass* OR *\ \-executio\ bypass* OR *\ \-executi\ bypass* OR *\ \-execut\ bypass* OR *\ \-execu\ bypass* OR *\ \-exec\ bypass* OR *\ \-exe\ bypass* OR *\ \-ex\ bypass* OR *\ \-ep\ bypass* OR *\ \/windowstyle\ h\ * OR *\ \/windowstyl\ h* OR *\ \/windowsty\ h* OR *\ \/windowst\ h* OR *\ \/windows\ h* OR *\ \/windo\ h* OR *\ \/wind\ h* OR *\ \/win\ h* OR *\ \/wi\ h* OR *\ \/win\ h\ * OR *\ \/win\ hi\ * OR *\ \/win\ hid\ * OR *\ \/win\ hidd\ * OR *\ \/win\ hidde\ * OR *\ \/NoPr\ * OR *\ \/NoPro\ * OR *\ \/NoProf\ * OR *\ \/NoProfi\ * OR *\ \/NoProfil\ * OR *\ \/nonin\ * OR *\ \/nonint\ * OR *\ \/noninte\ * OR *\ \/noninter\ * OR *\ \/nonintera\ * OR *\ \/noninterac\ * OR *\ \/noninteract\ * OR *\ \/noninteracti\ * OR *\ \/noninteractiv\ * OR *\ \/ec\ * OR *\ \/encodedComman\ * OR *\ \/encodedComma\ * OR *\ \/encodedComm\ * OR *\ \/encodedCom\ * OR *\ \/encodedCo\ * OR *\ \/encodedC\ * OR *\ \/encoded\ * OR *\ \/encode\ * OR *\ \/encod\ * OR *\ \/enco\ * OR *\ \/en\ * OR *\ \/executionpolic\ * OR *\ \/executionpoli\ * OR *\ \/executionpol\ * OR *\ \/executionpo\ * OR *\ \/executionp\ * OR *\ \/execution\ bypass* OR *\ \/executio\ bypass* OR *\ \/executi\ bypass* OR *\ \/execut\ bypass* OR *\ \/execu\ bypass* OR *\ \/exec\ bypass* OR *\ \/exe\ bypass* OR *\ \/ex\ bypass* OR *\ \/ep\ bypass*))
author: Florian Roth (rule)
Daniel Bohannon (idea)
Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)
